### What is this learning dairy about?

This learning dairy is a weekly notebook of CASA0023 Remotely Sensing Cities and Environments in UCL, which including the basic concepts and knowledge of remote sensing. The basic framework is provided by the lecture of this section, [Andrew Maclachlan](https://github.com/andrewmaclachlan/CASA0023)  

### How to use this learning dairy?

This learning dairy has totally 8 sections. Each section contains three parts: summary, application and personal reflection apart from section 2 and 4 which focus on Xaringan and policy respectively.
